snippet: Brandon Sherrod scored 18 points to help Yale rout host Cornell, 88-64, and clinch a share of the Ivy League title on Friday night.
abstract: Yale's men's basketball team defeats Cornell, 88-64; other college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Sherrod scored 18 points to help Yale rout host Cornell, 88-64, and clinch a share of the Ivy League title on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Yale Moves One Victory From Berth in N.C.A.A.s
headline.main: Yale Moves One Victory From Trip to N.C.A.A.s
